body:
- [x] Add new releases of GROMACS-SWAXS
- [x] Deprecate four versions that have a known issue https://gitlab.com/cbjh/gromacs-swaxs/-/issues/46#note_792716490

# Tests

New versions build successfully

```
spack install gromacs-swaxs~mpi@2021.4-0.2 ^fftw~mpi
spack install gromacs-swaxs~mpi@2020.6-0.2 ^fftw~mpi
spack install gromacs-swaxs~mpi@2019.6-0.3 ^fftw~mpi
spack install gromacs-swaxs~mpi@2018.8-0.4 ^fftw~mpi
```
title: gromacs-swaxs: add new versions
